text: Puerto Rico competed in the Summer Olympic Games for the first time at the 1948 Summer Olympics in London, Great Britain. Nine competitors, all men, took part in eight events in three sports. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:100%" |- ! Medal ! Name ! Sport !
